about_the_game:
Who could have imagined that a seemingly ordinary cave would become the source of all nightmares? Defaced: Dark Abyss is a first-person horror Survival Game that will challenge your willpower. Uncover a story that is darker than the absence of light...

Meet Ethan Kane, known as the most-fearless explorer of forgotten places. In his greatest exploration so far, he descends into the pitch-dark remains of an abandoned mine shaft. While going in alone was supposed to give him an extra kick, he will soon regret making contact in this godforsaken place. Little did he know that the secrets concealed here are so dark, they had to be buried beneath layers of stone and concrete.

Highlights


  • Hidden Secrets: Uncover the dark history of the abandoned facility as you piece together fragmented notes, journals, and recordings, revealing the unsettling truth lurking within its cold walls.
  • Easter Eggs: Discover hidden Easter Eggs scattered throughout the game, including homages to horror classics and inside jokes. - Can you find them all?


  • Survival Arsenal: Collect essential medications and tools to ensure your survival.
  • Solutions: Overcome your fears to discover items crucial for your progress.


  • Solve Puzzles: Use your found Items wisely, they might be the key to your escape from this dark place.
  • Interactive Environment: Explore and think outside the box as you combine clues and hints to escape your misery.


  • Unlock the Exit: There is no other option. Find a way, or decay in the abyss.
  • Threats: Beware of the Unknown. Will you confront them head-on, sneak past them, or use your wits to outmaneuver what's lurking in the shadows.

content_descriptors.notes: This video game contains virtual violence, screams, panic, blood & death.

short_description: Defaced: Dark Abyss is a first-person Horror Survival Game. While exploring a seemingly normal cave, you will soon realize that, hidden in the depths, lurks something you were never meant to see...
